channel.title: Npc Animations
channel.description:
Ok, i searched everywhere for npc animations, i had these at one point, a complete list of npcs and thier stand animations, i can't figure out how to dump the stand/walk anims from class5.anInt67 / class5.anInt77 (should be stand and walk anims client side) and i searched all over r-s and here, no npc animation list, the file i downloaded some time ago was titled like Npc_Details.txt and i can't get that anymore, can anyone help me get a "FULL" npc animation dump? i can't spend another 5 hours searching...
Keep in mind i need 317/377 npc animation ids, not 508...
